title: 3D Portfolio
description: Simple Three.js 3D portfolio, with buttons which point to my social network accounts.

title: Call Me Maybe
description: WebRTC one-on-one video chat application. I wanted to see how peer-to-peer connection works and made application which connects two peers through video.

title: You to ASCII
description: Converts live video to ascii text.

title: Game of Life
description: Conway's game of life project built with Rust, Wasm and Javascript. 3D version is built with three.js.

title: Text to Particles
description: My first ever react project written in typescript. The idea behind this project is that to convert user input text into moveable particles using canvas.

title: DSA
description: DSA (data structures and algorithms) is the repository of solutions for leetcode, codewars and atcoder, written mostly in rust and javascript.
